column2: Urgent job opening for  Shop Floor Technician/Senior Fitter at Pune. Education:  Mechanical Diploma or Experienced Field experience as per requirement  Job specifications : To carry out In house and Onsite installation & Commissioning work. Experience:  Minimum 2 to 3 years  Any additional technical training will be added advantage.  Communication: Should possess good communication skills.  Flexible to carry out onsite and offsite works.  We are looking for candidates primarily with experience in  Engineering Industry  He should have worked in a Similar role/company before. Exact Profile: 1) Candidate will be required to carry out assembly and integration as per engineering drawings in house. 2) Site installation and commissioning is must required. Should be responsible for maintaining site at customer place. 3) Candidate will be responsible for repair and maintenance work as well both in house and onsite of various engineering goods.(Adequate Training on goods will be provided) 4) Majority of assembly involves high pressure tubing and fittings Major components involves pressure and flow control components like Pressure regulators , Filters, Tubing, Valves etc.  5) Should be responsible for all AMC related work with customers. 6) Candidate must have some background of assembly work especially in piping,PLC work or tubing work  7) He should be have basic knowledge of reading GADS,ELECTRICAL DRAWINGS,P&IDS  8) PLC Course certification ( Bonus) If you are interested for the above referred position, kindly revert back with your Updated Resume with Photograph along with following details:  1) Current salary  2) Expected salary  3) Notice period  4) Total experience  5) Relevant experience  6) Current location  7) Reason for job change  Contact no.:- Nisha - 9082934672 Mail ID:- jobsearchthane1@gmail.com
